content: sole sts ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 4/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee instep chart always work the repeat marked by the red delimiters twice per instep row foot continue instep in pattern as established while always plain knitting the sole sts end when the foot is approx 5cm/2inches 5 5cm/2 25inches shorter than desired length having worked all the sole sts after one of the following instep row 2 8 14 or 20 if the foot is not quite long enough when you reach one of these row just work some rounds as follows until the foot is long enough work instep sts as they appear i e knit the knits purl the purls while knitting across all sole sts toe setup k3 1 then shift these 3 1 sts over onto the sole needle s and at the same time shift the last 3 1 instep sts over onto the sole needle s now you have 36 40 instep sts and 36 40 sole sts count the stitches now to make sure you got the numbers right ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 5/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk work sts as they appear knit the knits purl the purls to 3sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 round 2 plain round work all sts as they appear repeat these 2 rounds until you have 32 36 sts left on your needles all together then always work round 1 until there are only 16 20 sts left finishing leaving a tail of at least 20cm / 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in the ends then knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern florestan is the male protagonist in ludwig van beethoven s only opera fidelio leonore or the triumph of married love op 72 the setting is a political prison near seville in the 18th century where florestan is imprisoned for having denounced the illegalities of the governor don pizzarro the opera tells how florestan s wife leonore disguised as a prison guard named fidelio searches for her husband when florestan s execution is imminent leonore risks discovery and death for love finally freeing her beloved from his chains and his fellow prisoners from oppression the pattern of the socks shows vertical lines like the prison bars in the opera but they are overlaid by xs a very old sign for faith and love representing the final triumph of love over tyranny ____ ©caoua coffee 2017 this pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved there s one exception you are explicitly encouraged to make or sell items made from this pattern for charity purposes if you have error reports or any suggestions
